name: Leonardo
description: I am a Computer Engineering student at UFSCar (graduating in December 2026) driven by a passion for software development, automation, and data science. I apply my skills in software engineering and solving complex real-world challenges, especially through Data Science perspectives. My ambition and eager to learn lead me to embrace new technologies and challenges where I can contribute and grow. Check some of my work!
aboutBio1: I built my professional foundation at Cati Jr., leading agile software projects from client engagement to final development. This experience was highly rewarding, as I contributed to projects accounting for up to 35% of the company's revenue. Building on this, my focus evolved towards data science. I deepened this passion as part of a data science group at UFSCar exploring NLP and as a scientific researcher for USP, where I applied data analysis to predict structural needs in tunnels
aboutBio2: This journey culminated in a summer internship with Hyundai's Smart Factory Innovation team. In that dynamic setting, I not only applied my technical skills by developing predictive AI and Machine Learning models for anomaly detection , but also significantly enhanced crucial soft skills, including public speaking and teamwork. Now, as a short job intern at BTG Pactual Automation team, I am already contributing and taking important projects, while learning new technologies.
softwareEngineeringDesc: Specializing in full-stack development, I build scalable and efficient software solutions using Java (SpringBoot), Python (Django), React, and databases like PostgreSQL and MySQL.
dataIntelligenceDesc: I unlock strategic insights from data using Machine Learning and AI. My expertise includes Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and PyTorch to build predictive models and data-driven solutions.
productLeadershipDesc: As a Product Owner, I guide agile projects from concept to completion. I manage the entire product lifecycle, from client relations and requirements gathering to development and delivery, ensuring high-impact results.
projectsDescription: Here are some of the projects and professional experiences that have shaped my skills.

projectList.title: Hyundai - Smart Factory Innovation
projectList.description: Developed predictive Machine Learning models for anomaly detection, contributing to preventive maintenance.

projectList.title: Brazilian Championship Analytics
projectList.description: Interactive dashboard visualizing ball possession, passes, and counterattacks from the Brazilian Championship.

projectList.title: Cati Jr. - Commercial Member
projectList.description: Experience in leading projects using agile methodologies, with direct involvement in client relations, requirements gathering and documentation.

projectList.title: BlockBuster CRUD Simulation
projectList.description: A simulated CRUD application for a movie rental service, showcasing full-stack development skills.

projectList.title: Rossi Prunning Technology
projectList.description: Developed a web page for a family business, showcasing services and products. Also had the use of email API integration.

projectList.title: Portfolio Website
projectList.description: Literally the website you are currently viewing, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

projectList.title: BTG Pactual - Automation Intern
projectList.description: Currently working on automating processes and developing solutions to enhance operational efficiency.
